title: Beauty And A Beat
lyrics: Hợp âm viết ở Tone Lưu ý nhỏ dành cho các bạn mới choi Guitar: Ca khúc này tone chính là C,nhưng đầu bài hát vào bằng F. (F không phải tone chính) Show you off tonight i want to show you off Watch you got a billion could've never bought We gonna party like its 3012 tonight I want to show you al the finer things in life So just forget about the world we young tonight I'm coming for ya, i'm coming for ya Cause aaaaallllll i need Is a beauty and the beat Who can make my life compleeeeeete And it's aaaaaalllll bout you When the music makes you move Baby do it like you doooooooo oooooo Body rock girl i can feel your body rock Take a bow your on the hottest ticket now We gonna party like its 3012 tonight I want to show you al the finer things in life So just forget about the world we young tonight I'm coming for ya, i'm coming for ya Cause aaaaallllll i need Is a beauty and the beat Who can make my life compleeeeeete And it's aaaaaalllll bout you When the music makes you move Baby do it like you dooooooooo ooooo (lặp lại hết rap)
